akn:section.akn:heading: Small-boat navigation projects; charter fishing craft

akn:content.akn:p: § 577a. Small-boat navigation projects; charter fishing craft The Chief of Engineers, for the purpose of determining Federal and non-Federal cost sharing, relating to proposed construction of small-boat navigation projects, shall consider charter fishing craft as commercial vessels. (Pub. L. 91–611, title I, § 119, Dec. 31, 1970, 84 Stat. 1822.)
